logic

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the information about a team.

    This class contains the information about the team's name and team's color, the number a players the team has, the list of players playing for the team and the goalkeeper information.

    Version:
    v0.1 04/02/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
